ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Certificates should be provided to the trainees who have undergone the training by the concerned agency. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "In order to ensure optimum use of institutional infrastructure, as also to attract service providers, the training classes shall preferably be organized in the evenings and on public holidays. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The money paid as Stipend to the successful trainee shall be transferred only to the individual beneficiary\u2019s Aadhar-linked bank account through the PFMS.
